title: Are you Giving the Money Back or Not
itunes:title: Are you Giving the Money Back or Not
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines about whether or not you would give money back if it was dropped in your bank account by accident, after a bank accidentally deposits $120,000 in a couple’s account; which they spent most of it and now getting charged with theft! Also they opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners agree or disagree with a woman cutting off a kids locs for a better life. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
